title: Tiger Aspect - Wikipedia
snippet: In June 2006, Tiger Aspect and Tigress Productions were purchased by IMG Media, an international talent and rights group, but were then sold to Endemol UK in November 2009.

title: Tiger Aspect Productions - Audiovisual Identity Database
snippet: Tiger Aspect Productions is a British ... was later sold to the UK division of Endemol in November 2009. It is currently owned by Banijay since 2020....

title: Tiger Aspect Productions (UK) | Closing Logo Group | Fandom
snippet: It is currently owned by Banijay since 2020. The company also has a theatrical division called Tiger Aspect Films (shown on-screen as Tiger Aspect Pictures) and three divisions specialising in comedy, drama and family.

snippet: Private Company Incorporated: 1988 as Tiger Productions Employees: 79 Sales: $59.7 million (2003) NAIC: 512110 Motion Picture, Video Tape Production Â· Tiger Aspect Productions Ltd. is one of the United Kingdom's most successful independent television and film production houses.
